summary: Slayer was an American thrash metal band formed in 1981 in California. The original members were guitarists Kerry King and Jeff Hanneman, drummer Dave Lombardo, and bassist/vocalist Tom Araya. They were known for their fast and aggressive music, making them one of the most popular thrash metal bands. Slayer's lyrics often caused controversy, covering topics like serial killers and war. They released 12 studio albums and won a Grammy for their songs. The band went on a farewell tour in 2018-2019 but reunited in 2024 for some shows.
title: Slayer
